caption: A moody trip-hop track with downtempo beats, atmospheric samples, and smoky female vocals. Features vinyl crackle, deep sub-bass, and cinematic strings creating a late-night urban atmosphere.
lyrics:
[Intro]

[Verse 1]
Midnight city streets are wet
Neon signs and silhouettes
Walking through the urban maze
Lost inside this purple haze

[Chorus]
In the shadows we exist
Like smoke we twist and drift
Anonymous and free
This is where I need to be

[Verse 2]
Concrete jungle breathing slow
Secrets only night will know
Every corner tells a tale
Beauty hiding behind the veil

[Chorus]
In the shadows we exist
Like smoke we twist and drift
Anonymous and free
This is where I need to be

[Bridge]

The city never sleeps
Its heart forever beats

[Outro]
In the shadows
In the shadows
